Title: Hobgrot Slittaz
Legend: Mobs of Hobgrot Slittaz have often been witnessed accompanying the Kruleboy orruks to war. These malicious little brutes delight in eviscerating the foe with their slitta-knives and employing explosive devices pilfered from their duardin paymasters to blow unlucky enemies apart.
Intro: Each model in a Hobgrot Slittaz unit is armed with Slitta-knives and Sulphuric Scrap-grenades.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Light Finga

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Hobgrot Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Slitta-knives.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Scrap Totem Bearer. You can re-roll battleshock tests for a unit that includes any Scrap Totem Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Noise-maker. This unit can run and still shoot later in the turn if it includes any Noise-makers.

Rules.Name: Stab ’Em Good!
Rules.Fluff: Hobgrot Slittaz are surprisingly dexterous and are able to wield two weapons extremely effectively (for grots).
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with Slitta-knives is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
